CodeEditorModel.Text:
'Code behind Page - Add local subroutines for the page.
'Sub movePanelAvailability ' If Not PanelStatus_AvailabilityIN(0) And Not PanelStatus_AvailabilityOUT(0) And Not PanelStatus_PerformanceIN(0) And Not PanelStatus_PerformanceOUT(0) And Not PanelStatus_QualityIN(0) And Not PanelStatus_QualityOUT(0) 'If none of the panels are movin IN / OUT
' If Not PanelStatus_PerformanceINOUT And Not PanelStatus_QualityINOUT 'other 2 panels are not outside ' PanelStatus_AvailabilityINOUT = Not PanelStatus_AvailabilityINOUT ' If PanelStatus_AvailabilityINOUT ' animation.StartMoveAnimation(Group0, -280, 0, 400, False, PanelStatus_AvailabilityIN) ' Else ' animation.StartMoveAnimation(Group0, 280, 0, 400, False, PanelStatus_AvailabilityOUT) ' End If
' End If
' End If 'End Sub
'Sub movePanelPerformance ' If Not PanelStatus_AvailabilityIN(0) And Not PanelStatus_AvailabilityOUT(0) And Not PanelStatus_PerformanceIN(0) And Not PanelStatus_PerformanceOUT(0) And Not PanelStatus_QualityIN(0) And Not PanelStatus_QualityOUT(0) 'If none of the panels are movin IN / OUT
' If Not PanelStatus_AvailabilityINOUT And Not PanelStatus_QualityINOUT 'other 2 panels are not outside ' PanelStatus_PerformanceINOUT = Not PanelStatus_PerformanceINOUT ' If PanelStatus_PerformanceINOUT ' animation.StartMoveAnimation(Group1, -280, 0, 400, False, PanelStatus_PerformanceIN) ' Else ' animation.StartMoveAnimation(Group1, 280, 0, 400, False, PanelStatus_PerformanceOUT) ' End If
' End If
' End If 'End Sub
'Sub movePanelQuality ' If Not PanelStatus_AvailabilityIN(0) And Not PanelStatus_AvailabilityOUT(0) And Not PanelStatus_PerformanceIN(0) And Not PanelStatus_PerformanceOUT(0) And Not PanelStatus_QualityIN(0) And Not PanelStatus_QualityOUT(0) 'If none of the panels are movin IN / OUT
' If Not PanelStatus_PerformanceINOUT And Not PanelStatus_AvailabilityINOUT 'other 2 panels are not outside ' PanelStatus_QualityINOUT = Not PanelStatus_QualityINOUT ' If PanelStatus_QualityINOUT ' animation.StartMoveAnimation(Group2, -280, 0, 400, False, PanelStatus_QualityIN) ' Else ' animation.StartMoveAnimation(Group2, 280, 0, 400, False, PanelStatus_QualityOUT) ' End If
' End If
' End If 'End Sub
Sub movePanelAvailability If Not PanelStatus_AvailabilityIN(0) And Not PanelStatus_AvailabilityOUT(0) And Not PanelStatus_PerformanceIN(0) And Not PanelStatus_PerformanceOUT(0) And Not PanelStatus_QualityIN(0) And Not PanelStatus_QualityOUT(0) 'If none of the panels are movin IN / OUT
'if any of the other panels are showing, hide them. If PanelStatus_PerformanceINOUT movePanelPerformance() End If If PanelStatus_QualityINOUT movePanelQuality() End If
PanelStatus_AvailabilityINOUT = Not PanelStatus_AvailabilityINOUT
If PanelStatus_AvailabilityINOUT animation.StartMoveAnimation(Group0, -280, 0, 400, False, PanelStatus_AvailabilityIN) Else animation.StartMoveAnimation(Group0, 280, 0, 400, False, PanelStatus_AvailabilityOUT) End If
End If End Sub
Sub movePanelPerformance If Not PanelStatus_AvailabilityIN(0) And Not PanelStatus_AvailabilityOUT(0) And Not PanelStatus_PerformanceIN(0) And Not PanelStatus_PerformanceOUT(0) And Not PanelStatus_QualityIN(0) And Not PanelStatus_QualityOUT(0) 'If none of the panels are movin IN / OUT
'if any of the other panels are showing, hide them. If PanelStatus_AvailabilityINOUT movePanelAvailability() End If If PanelStatus_QualityINOUT movePanelQuality() End If
PanelStatus_PerformanceINOUT = Not PanelStatus_PerformanceINOUT If PanelStatus_PerformanceINOUT animation.StartMoveAnimation(Group1, -280, 0, 400, False, PanelStatus_PerformanceIN) Else animation.StartMoveAnimation(Group1, 280, 0, 400, False, PanelStatus_PerformanceOUT) End If
End If End Sub
Sub movePanelQuality If Not PanelStatus_AvailabilityIN(0) And Not PanelStatus_AvailabilityOUT(0) And Not PanelStatus_PerformanceIN(0) And Not PanelStatus_PerformanceOUT(0) And Not PanelStatus_QualityIN(0) And Not PanelStatus_QualityOUT(0) 'If none of the panels are movin IN / OUT
'if any of the other panels are showing, hide them. If PanelStatus_AvailabilityINOUT movePanelAvailability() End If If PanelStatus_PerformanceINOUT movePanelPerformance() End If
PanelStatus_QualityINOUT = Not PanelStatus_QualityINOUT If PanelStatus_QualityINOUT animation.StartMoveAnimation(Group2, -280, 0, 400, False, PanelStatus_QualityIN) Else animation.StartMoveAnimation(Group2, 280, 0, 400, False, PanelStatus_QualityOUT) End If
End If End Sub
